In England, in the seven days to 25 May, there were 14,449 new confirmed cases (25.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 May, there were 12,012 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (2,437 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 May is 3,913,295 (6,952.4 cases per 100,000 population).
